title: Angelina Jolie Is Glowing in Carefree New Fragrance Ad: Watch!
text: Angelina Jolie Is Glowing in Carefree New Fragrance Ad: Watch! by Rachel McRady 1:15 AM PST, March 02, 2017 Photo: Twitter Simply stunning! Angelina Jolie may have had a lot of personal drama this year, but the 41-year-old actress and director seems to have left all of that behind her in a beautiful new fragrance ad. Photo: Twitter Posing as the new spokesmodel for Guerlain’s “Notes of a Woman” campaign, Jolie appeared in an idyllic new commercial alongside a male model. Photo: Twitter In the footage she wows in a series of sunlit shots, walking through a field and lounging about in a mansion. She also appears to be running lines in a pair of silk pajamas. Photo: Twitter Guerlain says that the new campaign highlights “the story of the fragrance creation that embodies modern femininity.” Photo: Twitter “Guerlain’s new fragrance has been created for an extraordinary, sincere and authentic woman: Angelina Jolie, our new icon,” the company wrote on Twitter. “Notes of a Woman“: the story of the fragrance creation that embodies modern femininity. #MonGuerlain pic.twitter.com/vojGu52ZJA WATCH: Angelina Jolie Gets Emotional About Brad Pitt Split, Talks Health of Their Family: 'We Will Be Stronger' In addition to her work with the new scent, Jolie has a lot of film projects lined up. ET recently confirmed that she will return as the title character in Maleficent 2 and has signed on as a producer to the upcoming kids’ film The One and Only Ivan. Guerlain's new fragrance has been created for an extraordinary, sincere & authentic woman: Angelina Jolie, our new icon. #MonGuerlain pic.twitter.com/iwHKxu5Gmg For more on her life post-split from Brad Pitt, watch the clip below!
